events.name: ReportGenerated
events.description: Triggered when a new report is created based on the specified criteria.

events.name: ReportViewed
events.description: Occurs when a user accesses a report for review.

events.name: ReportExported
events.description: Triggered when a report is exported in a specific format.

events.name: ReportScheduled
events.description: Occurs when a new report is scheduled for future generation.

events.name: ReportDeleted
events.description: Triggered when a report is deleted from the system.

commands.name: GenerateReport
commands.description: Triggered when a new report is created based on the specified criteria.

commands.name: ViewReport
commands.description: Occurs when a user accesses a report for review.

commands.name: ExportReport
commands.description: Triggered when a report is exported in a specific format.

commands.name: ScheduleReport
commands.description: Occurs when a new report is scheduled for future generation.

commands.name: DeleteReport
commands.description: Triggered when a report is deleted from the system.

integrationPoints.name: DataWarehouse
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Data Warehouse for fetching data used in reports.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with User Management to handle report permissions.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Notification Service for alerting users about report generation or issues.
